attributes.action: Health and social care students/professionals to have free parking on sites
attributes.additional_details: As nurses, doctors and carers we maintain the populations well-being and health. Students working in this profession should NEVER have to PAY over £9000 a year to help the sick and vulnerable. During COVID-19 students, retired nurses and doctors and so on all stepped up to help those in need, risking their lives in the process, and after a gruelling 12+ hour shift they have to pay to leave (the car park). We may not be able to get a degree for free, but hopefully basic parking whilst working.
attributes.background: Parking for health and social students and professionals should be free when working or studying (e.g. when on placement, at the work place, at university etc)
